level.heading: Criminal action.
level.text: A person who willfully violates § 8-111.04 is guilty of a misdemeanor, and, upon conviction, shall be fined not more than $5,000 for the 1st offense or $10,000 for the 2nd or subsequent offense, imprisoned for not more than 1 year, or both. Each day that a violation continues is a separate violation under this subchapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 8-116, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 8-111.01.
